lead_paragraph: JACKSON--Anne. We mourn the loss of Anne Jackson, 1992 recipient of Guild Hall's Academy of the Arts Lifetime Achievement Award for the Performing Arts. Ruth Appelhof, Executive Director Martin Cohen, Chair The Guild Hall Board of Trustees 1/3
